name: Custom Zoom Profile Picture
description:
Create a more personable presence even when you're not in front of the camera!


Do you have Zoom fatigue and want to turn off your camera? Do you want others to see your face but find that your profile picture is too bright and unnatural? Do you want to promote your "brand" in a Zoom call but think it's awkward to just display your name?


Try creating your own custom Zoom avatar! A dark overlay mutes your photo so that it's not too stark. A circle avatar compared to the typical rectangle is gentler on the eyes. Now there's no excuse for your teammates to not remember your face!
